name: Michael Sweeney
text: Stopped there for lunch. Nobody else in the restaurant. We were seated and the young lady was very nice. We both had the lunch special but updated the toppings. We got a senior discount and our meal was quick and great.

name: Sarah Davenport
text: Great staff, very friendly. Fast service as well. They've never gotten an order wrong for us, and our family eats their pizza about once a week! Definitely worth signing up for the rewards program. Love it!!

name: David Ashton
text: My co workers and I won a pizza contest thought he company we work for and our pizza had FLY EGGS on it. This place is absolutely disgusting and wouldn't recommend anyone who values their money to eat food from this establishment. Truly disgusting

name: Cristina Lazzereschi
text: I'm italian  and I'm here on vacation with my family. We got a large pizza with mushrooms and pepperoni. It was GREAT! I give 5 stars to the pizza, but only 1 to the place. It looks like it hasn't been renewed  in ages. The lady who served us was nice.

name: Alexandra Tosciano
text: Gross pizza! Gross garlic sauce! Only thing I enjoyed was the breadsticks....no wonder the p.h. in seaside closed, food just isn't good.

name: Wilma Ingram
text: Don't eat, workers have dirty finger nails.

name: Taressa Hoover
text: Friendly staff, could use an updated restaurant maybe a new location. Food is great. Good for families and children or alone.

name: Jerry Susee
text:
This place has great pizza, and the wings are awesome!

P.S. derp potato "Joe" must be a troll.

name: Amanda Nunziata
text: They are always so nice and itts really clean inside. My food is always hot and delicious!!!

name: Jessie Weis
text: They have "pretty good" food for an awesome price.

name: Trina Mckinney
text: They need someone in there that takes more pride in their workplace. The walls in the booths have splatters of food all over them. Took my napkin and it came off easily. It's very dark and needs a remodel. Buffet food tasted like it had been sitting for hours and salad was a soggy mess.

name: cori duplessis
text: We were offered the buffet,fine. But all they put out was pepperoni, and sausage on all their types crust and only 1 other type of pizza the whole time we were there. Thumbs down today. But no problems really any other times. Go there every other month or so.

name: Cory Francis
text: Not sure why there are so many bad reviews. I have had pizza from here three times now and its a pretty awesome Pizza Hut.  I always ask for extra cheese and light sauce and they really do a great job at making sure it perfectly loaded with cheese! 100% would recommend!

name: Amanda Nunziata
text: I come here a lot and I get the 5 dollar power lunch and it's  delicious  every time. And the staff is always friendly

name: Cherribombz Lee
text: Super great! Old school Pizza Hut. Hot and fresh. They have a buffet and a salad bar. Very very good customer service. Nice open seating. A great place for a Birthday party or family gathering. The lady who greeted us was amazing and â€¦More

name: Konni Ballard
text: We had the Astoria sports coupon card, they advertised buy one buffet get one free, they do not honor the coupon. There was also a flip flop and hair brush on one of the tablets, we did not eat there.

name: Lexi Reibold
text: The pizza was way too thin, and it had no sauce.  When you took a bite it had no flavor, and broke as if it were a chip.  By the time is got to us, it was completely cold.  It was somehow covered in grease and totally dry at the same time. Paper thin and totally disgusting. It was by far the worst pizza I have ever ate.

name: AngelWind
text: Just trying to put this on top so people know that this location is permanently closed. Not driving to Tillamook for pizza.

name: Aj Maki
text: Guy named Shawn answered the phone. Pretty cool guy definitely deserves a promotion. He was friendly but not in a creepy, giddy way like that restaurant from Office Space. Thanks Pizza Hut! If i ever saw you in prison I wouldn't kick your ass! ;D

name: Louella Jensen
text:
Pizza was good .

MUSIC was to loud .... Atmosphere so so

name: Dan Dimick Sr
text: Great lunch personal pan and a meeting of friends.

name: ashlee cliggett
text: Carry out order ready on time. Awesome pizza. Friendly staff.

text:
good pizza
love the price $5

name: Salie Walks-On-Top
text: My pizza was as thin as a piece of paper,and had no sause. By the time it got to me it was all covered in grease, ice cold. As I took a bite it did not rip, it snapped like how a tortilla chip would. So just next time don't deliver it to meðŸ˜¡

text: Very friendly and good food

name: T B
text: Decent food and atmosphere

name: Heather T
text: Called becouse we wanted stuffed crust pizza with a thick crust. They lied to us and told us it would be thick. The pizza they delivered was paper thin. I would have been better going to the grocery store and buying frozen pizza.

name: Robert Bartlett
text: Great place to eat and visit with family or friends. Would visit again

name: Failed Productions
text: Got to the front of the store and watched an employee blow her nose and then go right back to work without washing her hands. Noped out real quick

name: extremistchimp6 â€ªâ€ª
text: Order came out incorrect and over charged us for it would highly suggest that you find another pizza place, staff knew they made the mistake and refused to correct it. Was hoping it was as good as the one back home but sadly mistaken, again I would recommend that you go to another restaurant. I should have read the reviews before going.

name: Mel Davis
text: Service very slow, waited 15 minutes for the waitress to come to take our order, only 1 other couple in the business, phone rang once, we left

name: pika gear
text: My family and I enjoyed a nice dinner here after our journey across America. The staff were nice and the pizza great!

Pizza was flat. Flavorless. staff wasn't friendly And the manager made the cook use old flat dough because they didn't want it wasted. Poor service and even worse food.
DO NOT EAT HERE.

text: Very dirty and it's now closed down

name: Dat Inthehat
text: Loved the food. My server julie was very sweet.

name: Erin Clifford
text: The guy that answered the phone was rude, the driver left a message on my phone that was him yelling at me to answer my phone or he's leaving, food is cold. 2 stars is generous.

text: they  left my  food out  and the food was cold.and the staff are  rude.heard one of the cooks  asking for assistance as the staff they where eating subway and saying thay did not want to work .as the cook Wis calling out table number & â€¦More

name: Mike Chattick
text: Poor service, confusing prices, poor selection of beer, pizza greasy and burned on outer edge.

name: Amy Jensen
text: Horrible!   Ordered carry out. Pizza was cold,  dry,  sauce less,  we ordered extra sauce,  dog didn't even want to choke it down. What a waste of $25!!!

name: ThatOneGuy
text: Worst Pizza Hut on earth!  It's hard to believe they're actually still in business.  Went out of their way to not take any more orders after 10:00 when they close at 11:00.  Finally reached the manager, Camden,  Who apologized,  but it â€¦More

name: brian nemeth
text:
It's Pizza Hut which sucks, but the folks here have always treated me and my 2 disabled children with friendliness and respect.
Don't know why this place has such a bad rap.

name: Cody Newman #ToyotaManiac
text: We went here while in vacation and the customer service was horrible. The workers seemed annoyed that we even were there. Also we ordered salad and they didn't even have it stocked. Don't recommend this pizza hut!

name: Shann Ruggles
text: Great Food Every Time We Go!! VERY NICE and Helpful STAFF -Thank you !!â˜º

name: mark lamie
text: Pizza hut aways suckes. I don't know how the chain is still in business.

name: Ashley Shell
text: Immediately was greeted with bad attitude and service when i walked in the door. The man who took my order was part of the management team and had a very annoyed and ungrateful tone with me. Worst customer service i have ever experienced!

name: Dale Jones
text: Good deals fine pizza

text: their driver banged on my door nonstop till I answered.

name: Luba Ethan
text: This franchise pump their prices up. $5.50 for a fountain drink. Avoid this establishment unless you want pay a premium on below average pizza joint and dated deco.

name: Randy Pickett
text: I ordered 2 stuffed crust pizzas from this establishment and received horrible service and quality of pizza.  The pizza had no cheese on it and tons of sauce.  I called that night and told the manager and he said he was going to replace the â€¦More

text: NEVER coming back and ordering from them again, I'm sure my daughters could make a better pizza with their playdough and they wouldn't have HAIR  in it (yes human hair!!)  The "manager" Stephanie is such a piece of work! WOW!! whoever made â€¦More

name: Chris Schultz
text: I've been ordering pizza from pizza hut for a long time I like to get what I ordered and when I called to tell them it was wrong I was told that the manager had stepped out side really quick and would call me back yeah no call back and then â€¦More
